Plot: Julian Fellowes and the cast of Downton Abbey present a staged version of Series 4, Episode 1 at New York's prestigious 54 Below. (Parody)
Title: Downton Abbey at 54 Below: Season 4, Episode 1 Sneak Peak
Writer: Kevin Duda, Lisa Lambert, David Mccall, Gregg Monteith, Simon Pearl, Jason Michael Snow, John Walton West
Actors: Christina Bianco, Jane Blass, Ron Bohmer, John Bolton
